statements: SELECT translation_id, original_text, translated_text, source_language, target_language, translation_date FROM translations;
SELECT original_text, translated_text FROM translations WHERE translation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'English';
SELECT original_text, translated_text FROM translations WHERE translation_id = 'c74c97c3-1a29-4525-ab33-9445f84f65b6';
SELECT translation_id, original_text, translated_text FROM translations WHERE target_language = 'Spanish';
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE translation_id = '12345'
SELECT original_text, translated_text FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'English'
SELECT translation_id, original_text, target_language FROM translations WHERE translation_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE target_language = 'Spanish' AND translation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT translation_id, original_text, translated_text FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'French' AND target_language = 'German'
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE language_code='en';
SELECT id, source_text, target_text FROM translations WHERE language_code='fr' AND id < 100;
SELECT source_text, language_name FROM translations JOIN languages ON translations.language_code = languages.language_code WHERE translations.source_text='hello';
SELECT id, source_text FROM translations WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT target_text, language_name FROM translations JOIN languages ON translations.language_code = languages.language_code WHERE translations.target_text LIKE '%world%';
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE language_code='en' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT source_text, target_text FROM translations WHERE language_code='fr' ORDER BY source_text ASC;
SELECT id, source_text FROM translations WHERE language_code='es' AND target_text LIKE '%example%' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT source_text, language_name FROM translations JOIN languages ON translations.language_code = languages.language_code WHERE language_name='Spanish' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_translations FROM translations;
SELECT * FROM parallel_text_data WHERE text_id = 1;
SELECT original_text, translated_text FROM parallel_text_data WHERE text_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT text_id, original_text FROM parallel_text_data ORDER BY text_id DESC;
SELECT translator_name, language_pairs FROM translators WHERE translator_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM translation_logs WHERE translation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY translation_date DESC;
SELECT text_id, original_text, translated_text FROM parallel_text_data
SELECT translator_name, last_active FROM translators
SELECT text_id, translation_date, translator_id FROM translation_logs ORDER BY translation_date DESC
SELECT text_id, original_text, translated_text FROM parallel_text_data WHERE text_id = 1
SELECT translator_name, language_pairs FROM translators WHERE last_active BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM translations;
SELECT source_text, target_text FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'English';
SELECT project_name, user_id FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT username, registration_date FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT translation_id, translation_status FROM translations_history WHERE translation_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'English' AND target_language = 'French';
SELECT translation_id, source_language, target_language FROM translations WHERE translation_id >= 10 ORDER BY translation_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_translations FROM translations_history GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT project_name, username FROM projects INNER JOIN users ON projects.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT translation_id, source_text, target_text FROM translations WHERE LENGTH(source_text) > 100 AND target_language = 'Spanish';
SELECT * FROM translations
SELECT translation_id, source_language, target_language FROM translations
SELECT translated_text FROM translations WHERE translation_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM languages WHERE country_of_origin = 'USA'
SELECT username, email FROM users
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE translation_id = 1
SELECT translation_id, source_language, translated_text FROM translations WHERE source_language = 'English'
SELECT translation_id, source_language, target_language, translated_text FROM translations ORDER BY translation_date DESC
SELECT text_content FROM texts WHERE text_id = 2

SELECT request_id, username, text_content, request_date FROM requests JOIN users ON requests.user_id = users.user_id JOIN texts ON requests.text_id = texts.text_id WHERE source_language = 'Spanish' AND target_language = 'French'
